title: 3D, layered and inline typefaces
content:
I'm looking for examples of quality, multi-weight 3d, bevelled, inline and layered display typefaces.

I'm thinking along the lines of Conqueror, History, Matryoshka, HF&J's shades collections and RM&Co's new one Utopia ( [http://rossimazzei.com/work/eventi-letterari/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/rossimazzei.com/work/eventi-letterari/ "http://rossimazzei.com/work/eventi-letterari/"))

Any ideas for others?

Thanks
author: stephen_k

comments.content: Is it still inappropriate to list our own offerings?

I think if you sincerely believe it's a good option (and you clearly state your vested interest) it's entirely OK.

hhp

@stephen\_k I like the font you presented in your post. These are layered fonts from our hard working madmen at the Fontry...

Convex and Dimensional  
 [Konkrete](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/fty-konkrete/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Konkrete%20Convex%203d%20layer%20chisel%20font_5352.png)

[Brannt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/thefontry.com/race1brannt)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Brannt%20Convex%203d%20layer%20chisel%20font_5771.png)

Vintage Layered

[ARB 66 Neoninline](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/arb-66-neon-block-jun-37-cas/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Neon%20line%20Block%20inline%20layer%20deco%20poster%20font_3437.png)

[Broken Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/www.thefontry.com/fhabrokengothic)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Broken%20Poster%20layer%203d%20vintage%20poster%20font_5398.png)

Comic Book Vintage

[Iron Man of War](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/www.thefontry.com/ironmanofwar)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Iron%20Man%20of%20War%20layer%20poster%20font_6317.png)

[American Patriot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/cfb1-american-patriot/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/American%20Patriot%20layer%20poster%20font_3798.png)

[Captain Narrow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/cfb1-captain-narrow/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Captain%20Narrow%20layer%20poster%20comic%20font_4714.png)

[Shielded Avenger](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/cfb1-shielded-avenger/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sheilded%20Avenger%20layer%20poster%20comic%20font_5183.png)

This is a cool one by the other guys...  
 [Power Station](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alphabetsoup/power-station/)

And these guys make several layered fonts...  
 [Greater Albion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416021258/http:/greater-albion.com/)

My apologies if this is not what you had in mind...  
JLS
